docs.abstract: comment on Amer preoccupation with reducing diets
docs.lead_paragraph: Fat people have been objects of ridicule far too long as have "drunkards." But as the medical profession has discovered, and the public is beginning to understand, obesity and alcoholism are illnesses deserving treatment, not derision.
docs.snippet: Fat people have been objects of ridicule far too long as have "drunkards." But as the medical profession has discovered, and the public is beginning to understand, obesity and alcoholism are illnesses deserving treatment, not derision.
